item.title: Zettel
item.description: Some h2 This is some zettel in the vault. It links to [[something]] Some obsidian callout [!info]- The scientific method Observation & description of phenomena Hypothesis to explain phenomena Use hypothesis to predict Use experiments to test predictions Willingness to abandon hypothesis in time of contradiction Now let’s add some images in hewe

item.title: 生き甲斐 (Ikigai)
item.description: 生いき甲斐がい literally means a reason for living. It’s a Japanese concept of motivation. 生き甲斐 make us feel the purpose of what we do and love, thereby bring a sense of fulfilment.
